word: When Satan quoted the promise, \93He shall give His angels charge concerning Thee,\94 he omitted the words, \93to keep thee in all Thy ways\94: that is, in all the ways of God's choosing. Jesus refused to go outside the path of obedience. While manifesting perfect trust in His Father, He would not place Himself unbidden in a position that would necessitate the interposition of His Father to save Him from death. He would not force Providence to come to His rescue, and thus fail of giving man an example of trust and submission.\97ST Dec. 10, 1902.
